title: guru krpalEka
sahitya:
guru krpalEka shrI hari krpa galgunA hari matamE guru matamu kAdEmayya sad-


anupallavi

  guru krpalEka bhAskara tanujuniki munu karagadamaina divyAstramu lEmAyE


caraNam    guru krpa galgina surapati tanujuni parama puruSuDaina shrI vAsudEvuDE 
paramAdaramuga pAlincalEdA dorakunEma kalinarulakI bhAgyamu
